name: Bullet Holes
description:
A parkour game about shooting holes in walls to get through the level

Run as fast as you can through a variety of fun and difficult levels. As of release, only 10 levels (and a free play stage) are currently in the game, but more levels will be added soon! This game was created for the 3rd official Brackeys Game Jam. Have fun, I hope you enjoy!

Brackeys if you see this please make a tutorial on a sensitivity slider that stays the same throughout scenes. I ended up figuring it out after the jam was over, but that took me over 2 hours. thx :)
